data.lyric:
[ti:Cheating on You]
[ar:Charlie Puth]
[al:Cheating on You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Cheating on You - Charlie Puth (查理·普斯)
[00:08.25]It started with a kiss
[00:10.02]On your momma's couch
[00:11.54]2012 was nothing serious
[00:16.25]And then we caught the feels
[00:17.83]It got really real
[00:19.21]Too good to be true
[00:20.48]I guess I thought you was yeah
[00:23.44]Why did I run away run away run away
[00:27.14]Oh your love was everything everything everything
[00:31.34]I know it's gettin' late gettin' late gettin' late
[00:34.85]But can I still be on my way on my way yeah
[00:39.61]I know I said "Goodbye " and baby you said it too
[00:43.50]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[00:47.39]I thought that I'd be better when I found someone new
[00:51.31]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[00:54.99]Baby now ooh cheating on you
[01:02.97]Baby now ooh
[01:07.28]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[01:10.71]Thought I could get you back any time of day
[01:13.93]Shouldn't have been so cocky
[01:15.38]Shouldn't have did you wrong
[01:17.37]Whoa
[01:18.72]And now I miss you bad really really bad
[01:21.72]Guess you don't know what you got until it's gone
[01:26.05]Why did I run away run away run away
[01:29.02]Run away
[01:29.74]Oh your love was everything everything everything
[01:32.92]Everything
[01:33.64]I know it's gettin' late gettin' late gettin' late
[01:36.76]Gettin' late
[01:37.42]But can I still be on my way on my way yeah
[01:42.07]I know I said "Goodbye " and baby you said it too
[01:45.35]You said it too baby
[01:46.37]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[01:49.22]Cheating on you
[01:49.87]I thought that I'd be better when I found someone new
[01:53.81]Ooh
[01:54.04]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[01:57.57]Baby now ooh cheating on you
[02:05.07]Baby now ooh
[02:09.52]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[02:12.83]Baby no
[02:14.47]There ain't no lips like your lips
[02:18.16]And nobody else feels like this
[02:21.94]There's no moving on I'll admit
[02:25.88]If you go away yeah
[02:36.64]I know I said "Goodbye" and baby you said it too
[02:40.40]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[02:43.80]Cheating on you
[02:44.71]I thought that I'd be better when I found someone new
[02:47.74]Found someone new
[02:48.47]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[02:51.81]Believe it
[02:52.18]Baby now ooh cheating on you
[02:59.86]Baby now ooh
[03:04.25]But when I touch her I feel like I'm cheating on you
[03:07.66]And you said "Goodbye"
[03:11.25]And you said "Goodbye"
data.trans:
[ti:Cheating on You]
[ar:Charlie Puth]
[al:Cheating on You]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:08.25]一切皆由一个吻开始
[00:10.02]就发生在你家沙发上
[00:11.54]2012声称世界末日那年也没什么新闻
[00:16.25]然而我们之间火花四溅
[00:17.83]感觉真真切切
[00:19.21]美好梦幻得难以相信
[00:20.48]我想你也是同样的体会
[00:23.44]可我为何就那样离开
[00:27.14]你的爱就是我的全世界
[00:31.34]我知道为时已晚
[00:34.85]但我仍有挽回的机会对吗
[00:39.61]宝贝 我记得我们对彼此说了再见
[00:43.50]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像对你不忠
[00:47.39]本以为只要找到新欢 我会过得更好
[00:51.31]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像背叛了你
[00:54.99]宝贝 此刻感觉好像背叛了你
[01:02.97]宝贝 此刻感觉
[01:07.28]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像对你不忠
[01:10.71]本以为我可以随时让你回到我身边
[01:13.93]不该如此自大
[01:15.38]不该对你刻薄
[01:17.37]//
[01:18.72]如今 对你的思念一发不可收拾
[01:21.72]大概人总是这样 失去才会懂得珍惜
[01:26.05]可我为何就那样离开
[01:29.02]就那样离开
[01:29.74]你的爱就是我的全世界
[01:32.92]我的全世界
[01:33.64]我知道为时已晚
[01:36.76]为时已晚
[01:37.42]但我仍有挽回的机会对吗
[01:42.07]宝贝 我记得我们对彼此说了再见
[01:45.35]宝贝 你也对我说了再见 
[01:46.37]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像对你不忠
[01:49.22]对你不忠
[01:49.87]本以为只要找到新欢 我会过得更好
[01:53.81]//
[01:54.04]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像背叛了你
[01:57.57]宝贝 此刻感觉好像背叛了你
[02:05.07]宝贝 此刻感觉
[02:09.52]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像背叛了你
[02:12.83]宝贝
[02:14.47]你的吻独一无二
[02:18.16]再也找不到那种感觉
[02:21.94]我得承认 我走不出这感情漩涡
[02:25.88]如果你就此杳无音信
[02:36.64]宝贝 我记得我们对彼此说了再见
[02:40.40]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像对你不忠
[02:43.80]对你不忠
[02:44.71]本以为只要找到新欢 我会过得更好
[02:47.74]找到新欢
[02:48.47]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像背叛了你
[02:51.81]确实如此
[02:52.18]宝贝 此刻感觉好像背叛了你
[02:59.86]宝贝 此刻感觉
[03:04.25]但当我触碰旁人时 我感觉好像对你不忠
[03:07.66]宝贝 你对我说了再见 
[03:11.25]宝贝 你对我说了再见
